Detailed Description

The AbstractNPC class is a derivative of AbstractCombatItem and a base class for all npcs.

Member Function Documentation

bool AbstractNPC::isCollectible (  )  const [virtual]

checks if AbstractNPC is collectible

Returns:
true if collectible, else returns false. Always false, since NPCs are never collectible

Implements AbstractMapItem.

Returns:

checks if AbstractNPC is movable or stationary

Returns:

bool AbstractNPC::isPassable (  )  const [virtual]

checks if AbstractNPC is passable

Returns:
true if passable, else returns false. Always false, since NPCs are never passable
